text: @realDonaldTrump Tax cuts only helped the very wealthy. Vets are dying in large numbers from coronavirus. Our best military leaders have resigned because of you. Judges being appointed are grossly unqualified, like you. You're desperate and a liar. I'm voting Biden and donated to McGrath.
